title: peralAm pErinbam murugan
sahitya:
peralAm pErinbam murugan tiru nAmattinai nI ninaindu uruguvAi manamE maravAdini


anupallavi

  kaNam tOrum paNattaiyE karudi mighap-pADu paTTu karuttODu adaik-kAttu varavE kavalaiyurAmal


caraNam    dharaNi tanil evarum tanakkiNai illAda sharavaN bhavaniDam sharaNam enraNugi
aravaNittaruL purindu AtkoLLavE kOri harahara murugA abhayam enavE kUri
